name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Tweet - Test your MBTI with just a click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creative replies by AI celebrities, make twitter fun again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bored with your mundane social media experience? Craving more drama? Try AI Tweet!

Are your Twitter feeds too harmonious? Missing those internet-breaking Musk tweets? Worry not, our plugin is here!

Key "features":
• Generates completely fictional "Musk replies" under tweets
• Makes you hallucinate as if the tech tycoon actually cares about your feed  
• Injects a dose of imaginary excitement into your dull social media life

Warnings:
• May cause loss of grip on reality
• Not recommended for users already struggling to distinguish the internet from real life
• We take no responsibility for any consequences of over-indulgence in "Virtual Musk"

Reminder: This is just a plugin, not actual Musk commenting. Have fun!!
